testcase.name: test with expected result: SkipVal input: skip
test with expected result: BoolVal(true) input: true
test with expected result: BoolVal(false) input: false
test with expected result: IntVal(1) input: let x = 1 in x
test with expected result: IntVal(1) input: 1
test with expected result: IntVal(2) input: 1 + 1
test with expected result: IntVal(0) input: 1 - 1
test with expected result: IntVal(1) input: 1 * 1
test with expected result: IntVal(1) input: 1 / 1
test with expected result: BoolVal(false) input: 1 == 0
test with expected result: BoolVal(true) input: 1 == 1
test with expected result: BoolVal(false) input: 1 <= 0
test with expected result: BoolVal(true) input: 1 <= 10
test with expected result: BoolVal(false) input: not true
test with expected result: BoolVal(true) input: not false
test with expected result: BoolVal(false) input: not 1 == 1
test with expected result: BoolVal(true) input: not 1 == 2
test with expected result: IntVal(1) input: if true then 1 else 2
test with expected result: IntVal(2) input: if false then 1 else 2
test with expected result: IntVal(11) input: let x = 0 in begin while x <= 10 x := x + 1 end ; x
test with expected result: IntVal(0) input: let x = 0 in begin while false x := x + 1 end ; x
test with expected result: IntVal(2) input: let x = 1 in x+1
test with expected result: ProcVal(List(Var("x")),Add(Var("x"),Const(10)),HashMap()) input: proc (x) x + 10
test with expected result: ProcVal(List(Var("x"), Var("y")),Add(Add(Var("x"),Var("y")),Const(10)),HashMap()) input: proc (x,y) x + y + 10
test with expected result: ProcVal(List(Var("x"), Var("z")),Add(Add(Var("x"),Var("x")),Const(10)),HashMap()) input: proc (x,z) x + x + 10
test with expected result: IntVal(13) input: let f = proc (x,y) x + y + 10 in f (1,2)
test with expected result: IntVal(11) input: let f = proc (x) x + 10 in f (1)
test with expected result: IntVal(20) input: let f = proc (x) x + 10 in let y = 10 in f <y>
test with expected result: IntVal(5) input: let f = proc (x) x := 5 in let y = 10 in begin f <y>; y end
test with expected result: IntVal(15) input: let f = proc (x,y) x - y + 10 in let y = 10 in let z = 5 in f <y,z>
test with expected result: IntVal(10) input: let f = proc (x) x := 5 in let y = 10 in begin f (y); y end
test with expected result: IntVal(11) input: let x = 10 in x := 11
test with expected result: SkipVal input: let x = 10 in x := skip
test with expected result: EmptyRecordVal input: {}
test with expected result: RecordVal(Var("x"),LocVal(0),EmptyRecordVal) input: {x := 1}

testcase.name: test with expected result: IntVal(1) input: if 0 <= 1 then 1 else 2

test with expected result: IntVal(0) input: let fibo = proc (x) if x <= 0 then 0 else if x <= 2 then 1 else let temp = 1 in let p = 1 in let ret = 1 in let y = 3 in begin while y <= x begin temp := ret; ret := p + ret; p := temp; y := y + 1 end end; ret in fibo (0)
